title: Domain and Range Visualizer
description: An interactive visualization that helps students interpret domain and range graphically by showing function graphs with highlighted number lines for domain (green) and range (blue).
creator: Claude Code
subject: Mathematics
Precalculus
Functions
learningObjectives: Connect algebraic restrictions to visual representations
Understand why certain functions have domain restrictions
Identify range boundaries from function graphs
prerequisites: Basic function types (quadratic, radical, rational, trigonometric)

controls.label: x-value
controls.description: Controls the x-position of the point on the curve

interactions.description: Moving the x-value slider moves a point along the curve and highlights corresponding positions on the domain and range number lines
